I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to meditate with full presence on #{selected_days}, starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

I will begin with #{initialFocusGoal} minutes of meditation each day and increase it by #{incrementFocusGoalBy} minutes after each successful session, until I reach my goal of #{finalFocusGoal} minutes.

During this time, all distractions will be silenced, and I will allow myself to be fully present.

If I skip or break the flow, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself — to slow down, breathe deeper, and strengthen my inner world. 🧘‍♂️🌿

basicQuest.title: Mindful Meditation
basicQuest.instructions:
### 🧘 Meditation

> **You’re not just sitting still. You’re taking back control of your mind.**
> Every breath you take in awareness is a **vote for clarity, peace, and strength**.
> Every minute you meditate, you **reclaim space from the noise** that pulls you around.

---

You’re not escaping — you’re **returning to yourself**.
And the world moves differently when your mind is steady.

So:

* 🌬️ Breathe deep.
* 🪑 Sit still.
* 🧠 Let your thoughts come and go — *but you stay.*

You already have **everything you’re looking for**.
You just have to **be still long enough to find it**.

---

### 🌟 Begin.

**No pressure. No judgment. Just *presence*.**
And each day you show up:

## **You rise. 🌄**
